data.text: @John_Kenney @HumzaYousaf Not flat, but rising from ONS survey. Independent SAGE now only relies on ONS for figures, daily testing no longer consistent enough. Waning of vaccines big concern, too: https://t.co/3BCQAtIDRD
@ZeroCovidScot @HumzaYousaf There are other illnesses you know that are going untreated
@ZeroCovidScot @HumzaYousaf These are figures I’ve been looking for. Can you direct me to a source so I can keep following them?
@John_Kenney @ZeroCovidScot @HumzaYousaf It’s the let it rip maniacs, surely?
@ZeroCovidScot @HumzaYousaf It’s ripping through schools right now and got much worse after the half term holiday.  A lot of new under 18 cases and parents getting it a few days later.
@ZeroCovidScot @HumzaYousaf Cases until the end of February still quite flat. Is this waning vaccine?
